question: Which Indian sportsperson has won silver in senior men's double trap at 2017 ISSF World Shotgun Championship?
explanation: Till date, India has bagged a Gold and two Silver medals in the Men\'s Double trap event at the 2017 ISSF World Shotgun Championship in Moscow. India won the Gold in the Junior team section of the event with a combined score of 401. Ankur Mittal won the Silver in the senior event, while 17-year-old Ahvar Rizvi finished second in the junior section. India is now fourth in the medals table with one Gold and two Silver medals. Italy is at the top with 11 medals, including 6 Gold. Australia is second, while Russia is third.
